original_text: Blessed shalt thou be when thou comest in, and blessed shalt thou be when thou goest out.
korean_text: 네가 들어와도 복을 받고 나가도 복을 받을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Blessed shalt thou be when thou comest in
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 들어갈 때 복을 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and blessed shalt thou be when thou goest out
